content: स्ना {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> (स्नाति, स्नात) {@--1@} To bathe, perform ablution; मृगतृष्णांभसि स्नातः. {@--2@} To perform the ceremony of bathing at the time of leaving the house of one's spiritual preceptor. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (स्नापयति-ते|स्नपयति-ते) To cause to bathe, wet, moisten, sprinkle; (तोयैः) सतूर्यमेनां स्नपयांबभूवुः <ls>Ku. 7. 10</ls>; स्मितस्नपिताधरा <ls>Gīt. 12</ls>, <ls>U. 3. 23</ls>, <ls>Ki. 5. 44.</ls> <ls n="Ki. 5.">47</ls>; <ls>Śi. 2. 7</ls>, <ls>Me. 43.</ls> {%--<ab>Desid.</ab>%} (सिस्नासति) To wish to bathe. -WITH अप to bathe after mourning. --नि to plunge deep into; {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} to be perfect or thoroughly versed in; see निष्णात.
